thread.title: Memphis athletic director Tom Bowen gets 2-year extension
thread.title_full: Memphis athletic director Tom Bowen gets 2-year extension

title: Memphis athletic director Tom Bowen gets 2-year extension
text:
Memphis athletic director Tom Bowen receives 2-year contract extension THE ASSOCIATED PRESS First Posted: October 08, 2015 - 8:28 pmLast Updated: October 08, 2015 - 8:28 pm We also have more stories about: (click the phrases to see a list) 
Places: 

MEMPHIS, Tennessee — Memphis athletic director Tom Bowen has received a two-year contract extension. 
The school announced Bowen's extension Thursday. His contract now runs through at least June 30, 2019. 
Bowen was hired as Memphis' athletic director in 2012. During his tenure, Memphis became a charter member of the American Athletic Conference. Memphis' football team won a share of its first conference title in 40 years and went 10-3 with a Miami Beach Bowl victory last season. 
Before coming to Memphis, Bowen was San Jose State's athletic director from 2004-12.
